about_the_game:
Cloud Cats' Land is a classic point-and-click adventure set in a unique world filled with captivating puzzles, hidden objects, and various mini-games. As the protagonist, who miraculously survived a shipwreck, your task is to solve clever riddles, explore every corner of a mysterious island, and collect items necessary for escape.

Upon spotting a mysterious lighthouse in the distance, you rush towards it, confident that salvation awaits. But, of course, things aren’t that simple! Instead of a peaceful stroll, you encounter an ancient deity who decides to stir things up by releasing... Cloud Cats! Yes, you’ll now need to not only solve puzzles but also negotiate with these fluffy "celestial helpers." Together, you’ll uncover the island's secrets, navigate through a sea of riddles, all while being charmed by every encounter with these cloud-covered furballs!

PUZZLES AND RIDDLES

The world of Cloud Cats' Land is full of mysteries and unique challenges in every corner. Solve puzzles with the help of magical cats, complete mini-games, and explore the island to find the key to your escape.

  • How can you convince the guards to let you into the forbidden zone?

  • How do you lull the vigilance of a wise sensei?

  • How do you steal a hat from a troll’s head?

  • What do Cloud Cats love?

  • What secret does the island of Cloud Cats hide?

  • And does the sea serpent have an allergy to fur?

DREAMS COME TO LIFE

After the shipwreck, you find yourself in a world where reality and fantasy merge into one. Here, you’ll encounter ancient idols, unusual characters, and mystical ruins filled with secrets. Explore the picturesque landscapes of the island, solve puzzles, and who knows — you might just manage to pet every cat on the island!

AN INTERACTIVE ADVENTURE

Cloud Cats' Land is a captivating adventure for all ages. The unique visual style brings the world to life, where every element is brimming with magic and wonder. The game is designed for those who love immersive stories, as well as those who simply want to enjoy some fun and relaxation with adorable Cloud Cats.

GAME FEATURES

  • A classic point-and-click adventure.

  • A puzzle-filled adventure populated by incredible Cloud Cats and other magical creatures that help solve puzzles.

  • Suitable for players of all ages.

  • Over 50 unique and diverse locations.

  • A pleasant mix of 2D and 3D graphics.

  • Catch and use Cloud Cats with unique abilities, build aerial bridges, and uncover the secrets of ancient idols.
